message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $115. I think it would be very valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $100 for it.
I understand your position, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $108?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am able to offer $105 for the product.
